name: The Frenetic Exposition
description:
In this game, you must shoot and survive, and as the name says, it is very frenetic and crazy.
Everyone wants to kill you, everyone hates you, and you must hate everyone.
Kill each of your enemies, fight bosses and use about 4 weapons available in this version of the game, and one type of bomb.
Anyway, I hope you enjoy this project.
Goodbye, DiaDeTedio.

In the next update i'm working in a procedural blood system and more realistic enemy deaths and player deaths,and the slow motion is better now,with no more lags.

NOTE:I'm working in a better enemy AI and allies for player.
